overview: Dominick Arena has an extensive management career in healthcare. Prior to Water Street, he was the CEO of Medex, a leading global manufacturer of critical care medical products. When Medex was acquired by Smiths Group PLC, Dominick was named President of Smiths Critical Care. Prior to Medex, he was an executive officer with Furon, responsible for leading its healthcare business. Dominick also was the President of three medical device manufacturing companies, including: AnaMed International, Hudson Respiratory Care, Inc., and Respiratory Care, Inc. He also currently serves on the Board of Directors of Facet Technologies and The Legacy Foundation. Dominick holds a bachelor’s degree in Chemistry from LeMoyne College.
